title: Bloomberg Markets: AT&T's Surprise Wireless Subscriber Gain
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: AT&T's Surprise Wireless Subscriber Gain
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Craig Moffett Partner/Senior Rsch Analyst/Founder MoffettNathanson LLC Discussing AT&T Inc. posted a surprise wireless subscriber gain in the second quarter, rebounding from a loss earlier this year and showing it can fend for itself in a cutthroat price war.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
